name: Family Walks and Hikes of Vancouver Island -
categories: Family Walks and Hikes of Vancouver Island -
description: Head out on a hike with the whole family. Written specifically for outdoor enthusiasts of all ages and abilities, Family Walks and Hikes of Vancouver Island - Vol. 2 covers family-friendly hikes in the area between northern Nanaimo and Strathcona Provincial Park. Each hike includes a map, step-by-step directions and full-colour photographs.
